entry.title: Expert Calls Cardano And Solana Biggest Offenders For Fake TPS: Here‚Äôs Why
entry.summary:
Justin Bons, founder and CIO of Cyber Capital, Europe‚Äôs oldest cryptocurrency fund, recently took to X to express his concerns about misleading transactions per second (TPS) metrics reported by Solana (SOL) and Cardano (ADA). In a thread, Bons argues that both networks propagate misleading information that deviates sharply from established industry standards.
‚ÄúThe two biggest offenders for ‚Äòfake‚Äô TPS metrics are SOL & ADA: SOL is misleading investors by a factor of 6.5, while ADA does so by a factor of 26.5! Both are guilty of ignoring industry standards for TPS,‚Äù Bons stated in his initial post.
Cardano And Solana: Real Numbers
Bons explains that Solana‚Äôs often cited maximum theoretical TPS of 65,000 is far from its practical capabilities. He breaks down the calculation based on the‚Ä¶

entry.title: Largest Bitcoin Miner on Wall Street Faces 20% Price Cut despite High BTC Production
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) mining profitability experienced a slight decline in July compared to the previous month, according to a recent report from investment bank Jefferies. The analysis points to a drop in Bitcoin's price as the primary factor impacting miners' margins. As a result, the institution decided to lower the target price for the largest Bitcoin miner on Wall Street, Marathon Digital Holdings (Nasdaq: MARA), by over 20%. Bitcoin Mining Profitability Dips in July, Jefferies Reports The cryptocurrency's value fell by over 6% in July, while the network's hashrate - a measure of computational power dedicated to mining - remained relatively stable. This combination of factors put pressure on mining operations, despite an increase in production share for US-listed compan‚Ä¶

entry.title: Crypto Market Flourishes In Turkey Amid Growth In Licensed Exchanges
entry.summary:
Interest in the cryptocurrency market of Turkey has skyrocketed. The country‚Äôs leading exchanges have been racing for licenses to operate. Applicants rose from 47 to 76, and the impressive list includes such popular names as Coinbase, KuCoin, and Gate.io.
This surge follows closely on the heels of Turkey‚Äôs recent push to offer more regulatory clarity for crypto exchanges and their service providers. It makes updates to the guidelines of the Capital Markets Board of Turkey for the purpose of informing the public about organizations that have declared their intention to comply with Capital Markets Law No. 6362.
Exchanges Eye Turkey‚Äôs Potential

entry.title: Hoskinson‚Äôs $1 Million Security Challenge: Can You Hack The Cardano Lace Wallet?
entry.summary:
Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson made something of a bold move toward beefing up security when he issued a challenge that riled up the crypto community.
In his keynote speech at the Rare Evo 2024 event, Hoskinson issued a challenge to anyone who could hack the newly launched Lace Paper Wallet‚Äîfor a prize money amounting to $1 million.
This is not about the money; it is more about ensuring that the Cardano ecosystem is always robust and secure. The challenge comes in handy as cyber threats continue to rise and further proofs that proactive security measures are a must in this evolving world of cryptocurrency.
If you can hack it; You can keep it! 1 million dollars! https://t.co/TTtHocHHbs

entry.title: Bitcoin Slips Below 200-Day SMA, Presents Dual Price Potential
entry.summary:
In the last two years, Bitcoin (BTC) has produced a strong positive price performance gaining by over 300% since the start of 2023. In 2024 alone, the crypto market leader has surged by 40% notably reaching a new all-time high of $73,750 in March. However, recent price developments indicate that Bitcoin‚Äôs upward price trajectory may experience significant changes in the coming months.
200-Day SMA Signals Bitcoin‚Äôs Price At Crossroads
In an X post on Saturday, popular crypto analyst Ali Martinez shared that the price of BTC has recently dipped below its 200-day simple moving average (SMA), indicating the asset is subject to a change in price movement.¬†

Nearly every Binance launchpad coin is now red. Kamala reschedules crypto leaders meetup.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 173 - ARE WE BACK?
entry.summary: BTC & ETH ETFs see huge $6bn of trading volume. ‚ÄòReal number‚Äô of liquidations estimated at $7-9bn. 274k traders liquidated on move. 60% of top 50 coins now red for 2024. Trump says US should not sell crypto holdings. Bitcoin not as good a hedge as gold: Cramer. Ark buys $18m Coinbase stock in drop. Capula reports $460m BTC ETF holding. Moonpay has highest volume day since April. Ronin bridge saved in 4000ETH white-hat hack. Bitcoin is pretend internet money: Tezos founder.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 172 - A VERY RED DAY FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits $50k, liquidations hit $1bn in sell-off. Macro sell-off and end of Yen carry trade blamed. Multiple altcoins hit cycle or all-time lows. Bitcoin dominance rises to cycle-high of 58%. Robinhood halts 24hr trading. Crypto funds saw $528m outflow last week. Justin Sun denies liquidation rumours. Jump Trading continues to liquidate holdings. Ethena founder confirms protocol has ‚Äòzero issues‚Äô. Binance launches native KAS mining. Cycle hasn‚Äôt even started yet: Cobie.

entry.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION
entry.summary: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they‚Äôd launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 171 - The Bitcoin Bounce
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%. Coinbase shares rise 2% after strong earnings. Marathon Digital falls 8% after revenue miss. Bybit exits France over regulation. Crypto(.)com surpasses Coinbase volume. Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea. CVG falls 99% after exploit. JUP votes to reduce 30% team supply.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 170 - BITCOIN FALLS BELOW 65K
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +0m, ETH ETFs: -$77m. Crypto falls after Fed, Trump speech & Iran threats. Mt. Gox still has $2.1bn BTC after distributions. Lummis introduces bill to buy 1m BTC. Large BTC holders bought $5.4bn in July. Tether makes $1.3bn profit in Q2. DeFi loans hit 2022 levels. Base sees 80% of active Uniswap traders. $900m of altcoin unlocks this month. Elixir launches deUSD as rival to Ethena.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 169 - NEIRO HITS $100M!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$18m, ETH ETFs: +$34m. Mt. Gox move another $3bn BTC, prices stable. ETH ETFs see net inflow as Grayscale outflow slows. BTC exchange reserves hit multi-year low. XRP up 7% ahead of potential SEC settlement. UAE banks integrate crypto trading. Bybit integrates USDe with up to 20% yield. California DMV puts 42m car titles on AVAX. BTC mining to be a $20bn industry: Bernstein. Russia legalises various crypto activities. Terra blockchain halted, Astro faces $6.8m exploit. Trump raised $21m at BTC conference.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 168 - SEC DROPS SOL CLAIMS
entry.summary: BTC falls to $66k after government moves $2bn BTC. Transfer most likely just a new custodian. SEC plans to drop charges SOL is a security. SOL ETF not happening in near term: BlackRock. ETFs to hit model portfolios later this year: BlackRock. Grayscale ETH ETF outflows slow marginally. Tron surpasses ETH & SOL for 24hr revenue. Pump(.)fun revenue beats ETH. BTC future tied to the elections: Jeffries. Polymarket hits $1bn betting volume. Polymarket integrates with Substack. Binance Labs announce 7th season of incubations. There is merit to Bitcoin and other coins: Elon. DeFi coins rise as MKR votes to share fees. COMP agrees to share fees with token holders.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 167 - CHATTING TO DOODLES!
entry.summary: BTC nears $70k after Trump speech, PoW alts soar. Crypto funds saw $245m inflows last week. Open Interest on BTC hits record $39.4bn. SOL overtakes ETH in several key metrics. Pump(.)fun overtakes ETH for daily revenue. Jito overtakes Lido for fees collected. $1.5bn altcoin unlocks in August, $600m XRP. Compound DAO faces $25m governance attack. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week.

entry.title: New Technology Is Making Bionic Limbs More Affordable
entry.summary: Alt Bionics founder and CEO Ryan Saavedra talks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about the Genesis Hand, an affordable $5,000 bionic limb designed for daily use.

entry.title: The Story of Solana Meme Coin Billy
entry.summary: Billy is the largest Solana meme coin on Pumpdotfun, peaking at a market cap of over $200 million. But it wasn‚Äôt always smooth sailing. Minutes after launching Billy‚Äôs dev abandoned him and sold the majority of their tokens. At the time, the tokens were worth $1,116 but at today‚Äôs value they‚Äôd be worth more than $8.65 million.
